actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 102-205.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 311.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Received in the House.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Ordered to be Reported.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. H. Rept. 102-821.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 467.
Mr. Vento moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Cleared for White House.
Message on House action received in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 102-347.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to permit Mount Olivet Cemetery Association of Salt Lake City, Utah, to lease a certain tract of land for a period of not more than 70 years.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to allow the Mount Olivet Cemetery Association of Salt Lake City, Utah, to lease a certain tract of land for use other than as a cemetery so long as such use will not prevent future use for cemetery purposes.

titles.title: A bill to permit Mount Olivet Cemetery Association of Salt Lake City, Utah, to lease a certain tract of land for a period of not more than 70 years.
